Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) recently declared a 4% increase in quarterly dividends, reflecting strategic financial management amidst challenging market conditions. Concurrently, its collaboration with Deloitte aims to deliver AI-driven industry solutions, bolstering business appeal. This positive news contrasts sharply with the broader stock market downturn, where a 10.82% decline in Salesforce's share price was observed.
